class_notes: Synchronous meetings on Wednesdays and asynchronous on Mondays. This course provides a systematic examination of modern organizations from the sociological perspective. The topics covered include transformation of corporate control, evolution of corporate management, power and leadership, innovation and diffusion, cognition and culture, equality and diversity, markets and environment, etc. Text: Organizations: Rational natural and open systems.
